thread.title: Will Fogo de Chao's First Earnings Be Tasty? Keep Track of Fossil
thread.title_full: Will Fogo de Chao's First Earnings Be Tasty? Keep Track of Fossil

title: Will Fogo de Chao's First Earnings Be Tasty? Keep Track of Fossil
text:
Will Fogo de Chao's First Earnings Be Tasty? Keep Track of Fossil Written by: U-Jin Lee 08/10/15 - 8:15 PM EDT Tickers in this article: FOGO FOSL FRPT 
NEW YORK (TheStreet) -- Earnings season is slowly trailing off but it's not over yet. On Tuesday , TheStreet will cover a few remaining key earnings, as well as important economic data. 
A number of companies will be reporting their latest quarterly earnings results after the market close. 
, Brazilian steakhouse Fogo de Chao , and pet food maker Freshpet are all scheduled to release their latest earnings results. Fogo de Chao is a Brazilian steakhouse, or churrascaria, which has specialized for over 35 years in fire-roasting high-quality meats using the Southern Brazilian cooking technique of churrasco. The steakhouse straddles the fast-casual and more traditional dining spaces. It will be the first earnings the company reports. For the latest quarter, the company is expected to post earnings of $0.22 a share on revenue of $65.26 million. In late June, the restaurant chain priced its initial public offering of more than 4 million shares at $20 a share. Currently, it operates 26 restaurants in the U.S., 10 in Brazil, and one in Mexico. Looking ahead, CEO Larry Johnson said that the company will continue to grow and expand. On the economic calendar, the productivity and reports is set to come out at 8:30 a.m. This is a quarterly report released by the Bureau of Labor Statistics that measures the level of output in producing goods. Look also for the release of the Redbook in the morning, which is a weekly indicator of chain-store sales. More Headlines
